verses.text: \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* bless \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w times|strong="H6440"\w*, \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* praise \w be|strong="H6440"\w* forever.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* heart make \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w boast|strong="H1288"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* humble \w will|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* magnify \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H8055"\w* \w us|strong="H8085"\w* extol \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name \w together|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* sought \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* answer, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* saved \w me|strong="H7311"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* terrors.

\w Look|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* radiant, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* faces unashamed.

Here \w is|strong="H6440"\w* one \w who|strong="H2659"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* crushed, but cried \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* heard \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* brought safe \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* every trouble.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*â€™s angel encamps \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rescues \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* taste \w and|strong="H3068"\w* see \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good, happy \w those|strong="H2583"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H2502"\w* refuge \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w*.

Fear \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7200"\w* lack nothing.

\w Even|strong="H3588"\w* young lions \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w poor|strong="H4270"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hungry, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w lack|strong="H4270"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* good \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*.

Come, children, \w listen|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* teach \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
\w Which|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3925"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* desirous \w of|strong="H1121"\w* life, loves many \w and|strong="H1121"\w* happy days?
\w Then|strong="H7200"\w* guard \w your|strong="H7200"\w* tongue \w from|strong="H3117"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w from|strong="H3117"\w* speaking deceit.
Depart \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H8193"\w* good; seek peace, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* pursue \w it|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* towards \w the|strong="H6213"\w* righteous, \w his|strong="H5493"\w* ears \w are|strong="H6213"\w* towards \w their|strong="H1245"\w* cry \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w help|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* sets \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* evil, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* root \w their|strong="H3068"\w* memory out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* righteous cry, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* heard \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* saves \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* distresses.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* near \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* broken-hearted, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* helps \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* spirit \w is|strong="H3068"\w* crushed.

Many misfortunes befall \w the|strong="H3068"\w* righteous, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delivers|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H7665"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7665"\w* \w all|strong="H3467"\w*.
\w He|strong="H3068"\w* guards \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* bones, \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* broken.

Misfortune \w will|strong="H3808"\w* slay \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ungodly|strong="H3808"\w*; \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hate \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w are|strong="H6106"\w* doomed.

\w The|strong="H4191"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H6662"\+w*\nd* ransoms \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w life|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8130"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* none \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* doomed \w who|strong="H6662"\w* takes refuge \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H8130"\w*.
